snippet: The private equity firm is the third defendant to settle accusations in the nearly seven-year-old lawsuit, which contends that a group of private equity’s top firms were unofficial partners in an illegal conspiracy to reduce competition.
abstract: The private equity firm is the third defendant to settle accusations in the nearly seven-year-old lawsuit, which contends that a group of private equity’s top firms were unofficial partners in an illegal conspiracy to reduce competition.

headline.main: Silver Lake to Pay $29.5 Million to Settle Suit on Collusion
